definition[0]: a room where the directors of a company have meetings
definition[1]: the place in a company where its board of directors meets
definition[2]: a disagreement between two or more directors of a company
example[0]: A brutal boardroom battle erupted last year for management control of the luxury hotel chain.
definition[3]: the amount that company directors are paid
example[1]: Boardroom pay has raced ahead, offering an inflationary example to workers being lectured about the need for restraint.
